# VxHub iOS SDK

> Server-driven iOS monetization & engagement SDK. Single `hubId` unlocks 13+ services (RevenueCat, Amplitude, OneSignal, AppsFlyer, Firebase, Sentry). All API keys managed server-side.

## Overview

VxHub is a Swift Package for iOS 16+ that provides in-app purchases, analytics, push notifications, attribution, paywalls, customer support, social auth, and more through a single `VxHub.shared` singleton API. The SDK uses a server-driven architecture — developers only need a `hubId` to initialize; all third-party service credentials are fetched from the VxHub backend at runtime.

## Documentation

- [CLAUDE.md](CLAUDE.md): SDK overview, quick start code, public API index, Info.plist requirements
- [Integration Guide](docs/integration-guide.md): Step-by-step setup with copy-paste ready code for every feature
- [API Reference](docs/api-reference.md): Complete method signatures, properties, and type definitions
- [Troubleshooting](docs/troubleshooting.md): Common integration issues and solutions

## Source Code

- [VxHub.swift](Sources/VxHub/VxHub.swift): Core singleton — all public API methods
- [VxHubConfig.swift](Sources/VxHub/Configs/VxHubConfig.swift): Configuration struct
- [VxMainPaywallConfiguration.swift](Sources/VxHub/Paywalls/VxMainPaywall/VxMainPaywallConfiguration.swift): Paywall UI config
- [VxSupportConfiguration.swift](Sources/VxHub/Support/VxSupportConfiguration.swift): Support UI theme config
- [Example App](VxHubExample/VxHubExample/VxHubExampleApp.swift): Working reference integration

## Install

Swift Package Manager: `https://github.com/ersel95/VxHub-iOS.git`
